Sentencas: Due to the ever-rising demand for energy and the need to address the critical issue of global warming, the focus on efficient energy systems driven by renewable energy has gained a lot of attention.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of reversible sofc coupled with organic Rankine cycle and hydrogen storage for renewable energy storage

Sentencas: Integrating fuel cells with renewable energy is a very attractive and promising solution to achieve this aim.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of reversible sofc coupled with organic Rankine cycle and hydrogen storage for renewable energy storage

Sentencas: In this study, a novel tri-generation system is presented and analysed for its exergetic performance.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of reversible sofc coupled with organic Rankine cycle and hydrogen storage for renewable energy storage

Sentencas: A Metal hydride hydrogen storage (MHHS) system is used in the study to supply hydrogen to the Solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Exergy analysis of reversible sofc coupled with organic Rankine cycle and hydrogen storage for renewable energy storage

Sentencas: In the ORC cycle, n-octane is selected as the working fluid due toits high critical temperature.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of reversible sofc coupled with organic Rankine cycle and hydrogen storage for renewable energy storage

Sentencas: Exergy analysis of the overall system helps in finding out the system components where the most energy is getting degraded.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of reversible sofc coupled with organic Rankine cycle and hydrogen storage for renewable energy storage

Sentencas: For the analysis, the exergy efficiency pertaining to net electrical power output, heating and cooling performance and tri-generation is considered as the basis of exergy assessment.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of reversible sofc coupled with organic Rankine cycle and hydrogen storage for renewable energy storage

Sentencas: MATLAB is used to develop a steady-state Parametric analysis is performed by varying the important parameters such as SOFC current density, SOFC temperature and pressure at the turbine inlet.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of reversible sofc coupled with organic Rankine cycle and hydrogen storage for renewable energy storage

Sentencas: As per the outcome of the present study, the maximum exergy efficiency was reported to be 46.5% at specific operating conditions.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of reversible sofc coupled with organic Rankine cycle and hydrogen storage for renewable energy storage

Sentencas: The ORC evaporator, heating application and fuel heat exchanger were the major sites for the exergy destruction with values of 258 kW, 175 kW and 91 kW respectively.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of reversible sofc coupled with organic Rankine cycle and hydrogen storage for renewable energy storage

Sentencas: Also, a maximum gain in exergy efficiency of around 17.4% was reported after incorporating a tri-generation system instead of power cycle alone.
Titulo: Exergy analysis of reversible sofc coupled with organic Rankine cycle and hydrogen storage for renewable energy storage
